subject: Main panel doesn’t scroll on mobile
message: When holding my phone upright, I can’t scroll down in the main pane.  It kind of moves up, but doesn’t scroll, and then it snaps back.  The filter pane seems fine.  It also seems ok in landscape mode.
userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (iPhone; CPU iPhone OS 18_6_2 like Mac OS X) AppleWebKit/605.1.15 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/18.6 Mobile/15E148 Safari/604.1
